original_text: Now you want to use the men and women from Judah and Jerusalem as your slaves. So you yourselves are guilty of sins against the Lord your God.
korean_text: 이제 너희가 또 유다와 예루살렘 백성들을 압제하여 노예로 삼고자 생각하는도다 그러나 너희는 너희의 하나님 여호와께 범죄함이 없느냐

sentences.original_text: Now you want to use the men and women from Judah and Jerusalem
of sins against the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 네 주 하나님께 범한 죄가 있구나
